name: GhostWalk
description:
You Died, but that was only the beginning. Now you have to race toward the light while avoiding ghosts who want to devour your soul.  The only problem is that the walk of your afterlife is endless and eternal.  The longer you go the more dangerous it becomes. How far can you go?

This is a small mobile game that was inspired by flappy bird created in 2013 using Construct 2.  

Click where you want to go.

Collect power ups, click their icon at the bottom to use.

Don't touch the other ghosts, it's rude.

I hope you enjoy!
